body: Below are example buildings and their component rooms. Note that many of these buildings can also be found in the kingdom-building rules.
name: Buildings
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Buildings

sections.body: An institution of higher learning.
sections.name: Academy
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Buildings/Academy
sections.rooms: 1 Alchemy Lab, 2 Baths, 1 Bedroom, 1 Bell Tower, 1 Book Repository, 1 Bunks, 2 Classrooms, 1 Common Room, 1 Courtyard, 1 Greenhouse, 1 Kitchen, 1 Lavatory, 1 Observation Dome, 2 Offices, 1 Scriptorium, 1 Sitting Room, 1 Statue

sections.body: The laboratory and home for a creator of potions, poisons, and alchemical items.

sections.rooms: 1 Alchemy Lab, 1 Bedroom, 1 Garden, 1 Kitchen, 1 Lavatory, 1 Sitting Room, 1 Storage, 1 Storefront

sections.body: A building to house guards, militias, or other military forces.
